jobs.title: Applied Scientist
jobs.description: Oracle India is seeking an Applied Scientist to develop and implement cutting-edge machine learning solutions.  This role will involve researching, designing, and deploying ML models to address complex business problems and enhance Oracle's products/services.  Strong machine learning expertise is required.
skills_required: Machine Learning Algorithms (e.g., Regression, Classification, Clustering)

jobs.title: Data Scientist-Machine Learning
jobs.description: Infosys Limited is seeking a Data Scientist-Machine Learning in Bengaluru, Karnataka.  This role will develop and deploy machine learning models to solve complex business problems, leveraging expertise in machine learning algorithms and statistical modeling.  The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical mindset and a passion for extracting insights from data.
skills_required: Machine Learning Algorithms (e.g., Regression, Classification, Clustering)
